thread.title: A Playlist For When You’re Feeling Sad And Also Horny
thread.title_full: A Playlist For When You’re Feeling Sad And Also Horny

author: Ari Eastman
title: A Playlist For When You’re Feeling Sad And Also Horny
text:
rdva2 You ever get a tingle in your nether regions while simultaneously feeling a little blue? And no, I’m not talking blue balls. I mean a touch of the sads. The weepies. Basically, you ever had too much wine alone? Yeah, it’s that feeling. Well, have no fear! I’ve put together a playlist that will titillate AND complement your mopey mood. It’s like our lord and savior Hannah Montana once said, you get the best of both worlds.
SZA – Drew Barrymore 
SZA has, in my humble opinion, one of the best, sultriest voices in the music industry right now. She could sing the alphabet and it would cause a reaction in my heart and private areas. Sorry, over-sharing? Also, THESE LYRICS. “I get so lonely, I forget what I’m worth / We get so lonely, we pretend that this works.” Ouch. Ouch. Ouchhhh.
Childish Gambino – Redbone 
The only Donald we acknowledge. Mr. Glover is a goddamn national treasure. This song is very close to perfection and has been in HEAVY rotation for me ever since it was released. It has these funky Prince (RIP, we miss you) vibes that are so sexually charged, I have a hard time keeping my pants on. “You wanna make it right, but now it’s too late.” 
Sophie Meiers, Gin$eng – You Left The Door Open 
This was a total random find on Spotify, but I love it and makes me want to cry!!!!
Banks – Lovesick 
Banks. Just. B NKSSSS. You can almost smell the desperate in this song — the begging and wanting. I SIMPLY CANNOT GET ENOUGH. “Cause I’m lovesick / And I ain’t even ashamed / And I’m hard up, for some time in your sheets.” 
Rendezvous At Two – F*ck Me & Feed Me 
Her voice is somehow so sweet and innocent, even when she literally says “fuck me and feed me” ??? Can I pull that off? How do you say fuck and still sound angelic?
